instruction: Can you please research which fast-food chains offer plant-based burgers?
output: Sure! On the bright side, there are numerous fast-food chains that offer meatless options such as McDonald’s, Burger King and A&W Canada (a Yum! Brands subsidiary). Since 2018, they have taken advantage of the trend toward meat-conscious consumption to offer plant-based burgers made by Impossible Burger and Beyond Meat, which can help dramatically lower their products’ carbon footprint.
